Name: Roosevelt Cocktail #2
Ingredients: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Rye whiskeys’ strength and spice cuts through and dries the rich sultana notes of PX sherry with the bitters, particularly the walnut bitters, adding flavour and complexity.
Nutrition: One serving of Roosevelt Cocktail #2 contains 152 calories
